episodes.title: Investing Insights: Tax Relief Week, Muni Bonds, a Stock Pick, and More
episodes.author: david.chung@morningstar.com
episodes.summary: This week, Bob Johnson gives his take on recent economic data, Emory Zink looks at what’s next for Munis, Christine Benz shares tips on how to become more tax-savvy, Eric Compton highlights a wide-moat bank, and Scott Halver shares our Weekly Wrap.

episodes.title: Investing Insights: Europe's Economy, Netflix, Fund Picks, and More
episodes.author: david.chung@morningstar.com
episodes.summary: This week, Bob Johnson gives his take on European economic data, Russ Kinnel looks at recent fund reopenings, Christine Benz shares the best ways for smaller investors to get advice, Neil Macker talks Netflix, and Jeremy Glaser shares our Weekly Wrap.

episodes.title: Investing Insights: Inflation Data, Financial Planning Myths, Picks, and More
episodes.author: david.chung@morningstar.com
episodes.summary: This week, Bob Johnson gives his take on recent inflation data, Christine Benz dispels financial planning myths, Ben Johnson talks liquid alternatives ETFs, Heather Larsen looks at Target-Date Funds, and Jeremy Glaser hosts The Weekly Wrap.

episodes.title: Investing Insights: Trade Data, 2 Stock Picks, and More
episodes.author: david.chung@morningstar.com
episodes.summary: This week, Bob Johnson gives his take on recent economic data, Russ Kinnel talks mutual funds, Christine Benz highlights the drawbacks of last-minute IRA contributions, Alex Bryan looks at "low-vol" strategies, and Jeremy Glaser shares our Weekly Wrap.

episodes.title: Investing Insights: Jobs Report, Apple Earnings, and More
episodes.author: david.chung@morningstar.com
episodes.summary: This week, Bob Johnson digs into the jobs report, Russ Kinnel on fund pricing, Christine Benz talks about recalibrating foreign stock holdings, Katie Reichart shares a fund pick, Brian Colello recaps Apple’s earnings, and we end with the Weekly Wrap.
